619200.name: Fantasy Grounds - Fantastic Far East (Token Pack)
619200.description:
Fantastic Far East

This token pack contains 29 tokens. This pack contains a variety of Characters and monsters that can be used in a Far East setting or any Fantasy setting.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Anthro Foo Dog
  • Female Blue Skinned Kensei
  • 2 Female Elven Monks
  • Female Human Kensei
  • Female Human Elemental Monk
  • Female Human Fighter
  • Female Human Warrior
  • 3 Kenkus
  • 3 Living Statues
  • Male Half-Orc Samurai
  • Male Human Archer
  • Male Human Assassin
  • Male Human Heavy Spearman
  • Male Human Heavy Clubber
  • 2 Male Human Monks
  • Male Human Naginata
  • Male Human Spearman
  • Male Human Yojimbo
  • Female Mandragorna
  • Tusked Monster
  • Undead Skeleton
  • 2 Oni
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
